feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:55 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 09:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or snow squalls. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries or local snow squalls. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with ice pellets before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
